column5: What, no apology from you on the Can/US game? And don't you dare answer this thread!
Ya... umm today.. I think im gonna keep my mouth shut... its gonna be a tough one....

All I can say is take out Miller in the first shift and we will walk away with it. My daughters 10th family B-day party is today at 3pm she has already been warned there will be no party until Canada takes the gold.  This is the best ending to what has been a great Canadian Olympics what a game it will be.  Cheers
I think Miller is going to play the best game of his life today. I just hope Luongo will as well.
Sounds like my place Mike.    Grand-son's Bday party at out house today.   We set the time for everyone to arrive AFTER THE GAME.    Not sure which place will be louder - Vancouver or my living room.
Take note Monique this is what it takes to quiet our fearless leader .   Art
YEEE HAAA!!!!  (Still cant say it.. not till theres only 5 min left!!!)
